$\green{9}{,}150$ is composed of:  
$\green{9 \text{ thousands}} + 1  \text{ hundred} + 5 \text{ tens}$.  

 We can use place value to express this in a different way.

$\green{9 \text{ thousands}}$ can be written as $\blue{8 \text{ thousands} + 1 \text{ thousand}}$.  

So, $\green{9 \text{ thousands}} + 1 \text{ hundred}$ can be regrouped this way:  

$\green{9 \text{ thousands}} + 1 \text{ hundred}$  
$\begin{align}
&=\blue{8 \text{ thousands} + 1 \text{ thousand}} + 1 \text{ hundred}\\
&= 8 \text{ thousands} + 10 \text{ hundreds} + 1 \text{ hundred}\\
&= 8 \text{ thousands} + \purple{11} \text{ hundreds}.\end{align}$

The other digit will not change.

|  | | | | |
- | :- | :-| :-| :-
$9{,}150$ | $=$ | $9 \text{ thousands}$ | $+$| $1\text{ hundred}$ | $+$| $5 \text{ tens}$
$9{,}150$ | $=$ | $8 \text{ thousands}$ | $+$|$\maroonD{11\text{ hundreds}}$  | $+$| $5 \text{ tens}$
